title: Substrate Governance Tile
description: Schema for the substrate identity and stability monitoring tile.

status_light.description: Single-word status indicator for the substrate.

headline.description: Concise, human-readable summary of the substrate state.

identity_stability_index.description: A score from 0.0 to 1.0 indicating confidence in substrate integrity.

drift_flags.description: A list of specific, machine-readable flags indicating the nature of any detected drift.

last_attestation_timestamp.description: The ISO 8601 timestamp of the last successful attestation measurement.

attestation_provider.description: The service or technology that performed the attestation.

details_url.description: A link to a detailed report or dashboard for further analysis.
